queries.query_name: Non Kube System Pod With Host Mount
queries.description: A non kube-system workload should not have hostPath mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-prometheus-node-exporter' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/proc' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-prometheus-node-exporter' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/proc' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-prometheus-node-exporter' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/sys' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-prometheus-node-exporter' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/sys' mounted

queries.query_name: PSP Allows Containers To Share The Host Network Namespace
queries.description: Check if Pod Security Policies allow containers to share the host network namespace.

files.expected_value: 'spec.hostNetwork' should be set to false or undefined

queries.description: PodSecurityPolicy should not allow privilege escalation

queries.query_name: PSP With Unrestricted Access to Host Path
queries.description: PodSecurityPolicy should set 'readOnly' to true in every host path allowed

files.expected_value: 'spec.allowedHostPaths' should be defined and not null
'spec.allowedHostPaths' should be defined and not null
'spec.allowedHostPaths' should be defined and not null
'spec.allowedHostPaths' should be defined and not null
'spec.allowedHostPaths' should be defined and not null

queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{grafana}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{grafana-sc-dashboard}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-prometheus-node-exporter}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{node-exporter}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{grafana-sc-datasources}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{download-dashboards}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-kube-state-metrics}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kube-state-metrics}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with wildcard RBAC permissions provide excessive rights to the Kubernetes API and should be avoided. The principle of least privilege recommends to specify only the set of needed objects and actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-prometheus-op-operator}}.rules[3].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-prometheus-op-operator}}.rules[3].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-prometheus-op-operator}}.rules[1].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-prometheus-op-operator}}.rules[1].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-prometheus-op-operator}}.rules[2].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-prometheus-op-operator}}.rules[2].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-prometheus-op-operator}}.rules[0].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-prometheus-op-operator}}.rules[0].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

queries.description: Container should not share the host process ID namespace

queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{grafana}}.volumeMounts.name={{ldap}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{grafana}}.volumeMounts.name={{config}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{download-dashboards}}.volumeMounts.name={{config}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{grafana}}.volumeMounts.name={{sc-datasources-volume}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{download-dashboards}}.volumeMounts.name={{storage}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{grafana}}.volumeMounts.name={{sc-dashboard-provider}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{grafana}}.volumeMounts.name={{storage}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{grafana-sc-datasources}}.volumeMounts.name={{sc-datasources-volume}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

queries.description: Memory limits should be defined for each container. This prevents potential resource exhaustion by ensuring that containers consume not more than the designated amount of memory
Memory requests should be defined for each container. This allows the kubelet to reserve the requested amount of system resources and prevents over-provisioning on individual nodes
Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities
Pod Security Policy allows containers to share the host process ID namespace

files.expected_value: 'spec.hostPID' should be set to false or undefined

queries.description: Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.

Containers must not be allowed to run with root privileges, which means the attributes 'privileged','allowPrivilegeEscalation' and 'readOnlyRootFilesystem' must be set to false, 'runAsUser.rule' must be set to 'MustRunAsNonRoot', and adding the root group must be forbidden
Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled

metadata.name={{release-name-kube-state-metrics}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests
CPU requests should be set to ensure the sum of the resource requests of the scheduled Containers is less than the capacity of the node

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context

queries.query_name: Object Is Using A Deprecated API Version
queries.description: Kubernetes APIs evolve over time and are sometimes removed with newer releases. To prevent incompatibilities when upgrading Kubernetes, deprecated APIs should be replaced with newer and more stable API versions.

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.apiVersion of Deployment  is deprecated and is {{apps/v1beta2}}
metadata.name={{psp-release-name-prometheus-node-exporter}}.apiVersion of ClusterRoleBinding  is deprecated and is {{rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1beta1}}
metadata.name={{release-name-kube-state-metrics}}.apiVersion of ClusterRoleBinding  is deprecated and is {{rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1beta1}}
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.apiVersion of RoleBinding  is deprecated and is {{rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1beta1}}
metadata.name={{psp-release-name-prometheus-node-exporter}}.apiVersion of ClusterRole  is deprecated and is {{rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1beta1}}
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.apiVersion of Role  is deprecated and is {{rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1beta1}}
metadata.name={{release-name-kube-state-metrics}}.apiVersion of Deployment  is deprecated and is {{extensions/v1beta1}}
metadata.name={{release-name-kube-state-metrics}}.apiVersion of ClusterRole  is deprecated and is {{rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1beta1}}
metadata.name={{release-name-prometheus-node-exporter}}.apiVersion of DaemonSet  is deprecated and is {{extensions/v1beta1}}
